newsitem.title: USA: Informix names Finocchio president, CEO.
newsitem.headline: Informix names Finocchio president, CEO.

text.p: Informix Corp said Tuesday that chairman Phil White relenquished his role as chief executive officer to Robert Finocchio Jr., a 3Com Corp senior executive. White will remain chairman.
Finocchio, 46, will improve the software company's operations to make the business more predictable, he said in an interview.

Informix, which sells database software, has been struggling to recover from a disasterous marketing gaffe earlier this year. Analysts had speculated White would bring in help from outside to turn the company around.
Finocchio was most recently the president of 3Com's systems unit. He was one of the managers that helped 3Com broaden its product lines and expand in faster-growing markets, Informix said.
